title: 98/739/EC: Commission Decision of 14 December 1998 amending Decision 95/328/EC establishing health certification for fishery products from third countries which are not yet covered by a specific decision (notified under document number C(1998) 4044) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 14 December 1998 amending Decision 95/328/EC establishing health certification for fishery products from third countries which are not yet covered by a specific decision (notified under document number C(1998) 4044) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/739/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 4 of Decision 95/328/EC the words 'to 31 December 1998` are replaced by 'to 31 December 2000`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
